==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|しい|たけ|yomi=k}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|椎|tr1=shī|t1=[[shii tree]]|茸|tr2=take|t2=mushroom|lang=ja|sort=しいたけ}}, as the shii tree provides the dead logs on which it is typically cultivated.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|しいたけ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,NHK|a=Ja-Shiitake.oga}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しいたけ|シイタケ|hhira=しひたけ}}

# A type of [[edible]] [[mushroom]], ''[[Lentinula edodes]]'', the [[shiitake]] mushroom.
